item.description: The Problem A photographer needs an online portfolio. The requirements sound simple: Upload photos from a phone or laptop Organise them into galleries Have them appear on a website No terminal. No code editors. No deployment commands. Most solutions fail on at least one count. Managed platforms (Squarespace, SmugMug) cost money and lock you in. Self-hosted galleries need a server. Static site generators need technical knowledge to publish. The gap is between “I just want to drag photos into a folder” and “here’s your website”.
